bibl.title: Joseph Mifford vs William Cochrane. Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of King
In the district court of the 3rd Judicial District Ty. Holding terms at Seattle in King Co. W T.
Joseph Mifford Pett. vs Wm Cochrane Shff of King Co W. T.
Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus.
To the Hon Thomas Burke Judge of the said DT CI:

Your petitioner represents to your honor at the Court. That he is wrongfully retrained of his liberty by the above named William Cochrane Shff of King Co W. T. That said William Cochrane as such sheriff wrongfully retrains this plaintiff of his liberty, in the County Jail of King Co W. T. in the City of Seattle W. T.

That heretofore trust on this morning of Tuesday the 12th day of February A D 1889, the said William Cochrane as such sheriff caused this plaintiff to be arrested and imprisoned in said Jail as aforesaid, and that said Cochrane in causing the said arrest and imprisonment, acted without any legal authority; that he had no warrant authority or dutysaid arrest and imprisonment, and that, in causing said arrest and imprisonment he was not acting under the direction or authority of any court or any Judge or any committing magistrate

2d - That the cause or pretense for this restraining plaintiff of his liberty is not known to the ptff further than then that he believes said Cochrane thus holds him in custody as an act by reason of certain direction received by said
I, Joseph Mifford on my oath say that I am plaintiff heard and have heard the foregoing petition read over and the pett and allegations therin containing an him as I believe. Jos L Mufford
Subscribed and sworn to by Josephy Mufford before me and in my presence this Febry 14 1889 J. M. Glasgow.
Notary Public in an for Washington Territory
NO 6567 Joseph Mufford vs William Cochrane Shff
Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus

FILED FEB 14 1889 W E Ledgerwood Clerk By Deputy Clerk
C. S. Gleasern Petitioner Georgion
